ygData.subject: RE: Norrathian Lore: Nagafen's Lair (was: Archmage Answ ers)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, some of those are downright odd.  Gotta love it but I m not sure it says much of anything.  I have the following questions from these pictures: Who is the
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, some of those are downright odd. Gotta love it but I'm not sure it
says much of anything. I have the following questions from these pictures:

Who is the dude in the one on the wall behind the bed laying down with the
yellow hat with the two kobolds dancing above him? Is that the fire goblin
king?

Why does naggy look like a big dog?

What's with the guy with the big headdress?

What's with the kobolds being chased by gobs being chased by kobolds being
chased by gobs?

These are weird.

Faras
